intro: Berkheya bipinnatifida var. cordata, commonly known as the heartleaf Berkheya, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Asteraceae and is characterized by its distinctive, heart-shaped leaves. The plant produces yellow-orange composite flowers that bloom in late summer. It thrives in well-drained soils and full sun, making it suitable for rock gardens or containers. Its ornamental value is enhanced by its unique foliage and vibrant blooms.
